Package org.jerkar.tool

Contains core classes of Jerkar automation tool.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JkBuild Base class defining commons tasks and utilities necessary for building any kind of project, regardless involved technologies.
JkBuildDependencySupport Template build definition class providing support for managing dependencies and multi-projects.
JkBuildDependencySupport.JkOptionRepo Option for a single repository
JkBuildDependencySupport.JkOptionRepos Options for multi-purpose repositories.
JkBuildPlugin A plugin base class to extend to alter JkBuild object.
JkBuildPlugins Set of plugins configured or activated in a JkBuild.
JkConstants Holds constants about project structures
JkInit Initializer for build instances.
JkModelMethod Reference to a build method (callable Jerkar from command line).
JkOptions Key/value string storage for build parameters.
JkScaffolder Object that process scaffolding.
JkSlaveBuilds Defines slaves of a given master build.
JkUtilsTool Utilities related to running piece of code outside of the tool itself.
 

Exception Summary
JkException Exception launched to break the build.
 

Annotation Types Summary
JkDoc Documents the annotated element so that, Jerkar can display some information when 'help' or 'helpPlugins' are requested.
JkImport Specifies the libraries necessary to compile and run the annotated class as a Jerkar build.
JkProject Specifies that the annotated element is a build of a another project.
 

Package org.jerkar.tool Description

Contains core classes of Jerkar automation tool.
